LaserProcessMonitor

Contains logic used to monitor and react to various dynamic laser processes

Functions
GetBreakthroughStatus
call LaserProcessMonitor.GetBreakthroughStatus(
&breakStat
);

Query the breakthrough status.

Result Status Codes
-2

INSUFFICIENT_SIGNAL_RANGE

-1

TIMEOUT

0

NOT_ACTIVE

1

ACTIVE

2

BREAKTHROUGH_FOUND

Response Parameters
&breakStat

the result status code

StartBreakthroughDetection

Begin breakthrough detection with the specified parameters

Parameters
thresholdTime

the time window for the measurement

thresholdValue

the query value

window

the signal window

StopBreakthroughDetection
LaserProcessMonitor.StopBreakthroughDetection();

Disable breakthrough detection monitoring
